title: "Face-recognition attendance in Yamunanagar MC offices"
excerpt: "Adapting to new technology, Municipal Corporation, Yamunanagar-Jagadhri (MCYJ) has installed face-recognition attendance marking systems at its all three offices in Yamunanagar and Jagadhri."
